metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0394 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in rawv6_push_pending_frames innet/ipv6/raw.c in the network subcomponent in the Linux kernel. This flawcauses the system to crash.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
